sidebar.name: YI 'DAVID' LI
sidebar.about: Hi, I’m David, a computer science student focused on building practical software. I primarily work with C++ and JavaScript and am developing a strong foundation in data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming through coursework and projects. I’m continuously improving my skills by writing, testing, and refining real code.

education.degree: Bachelor of Art in Computer Science

certifications.title: Intro to Web Development - CodePath Certificate
certifications.detail: Completed hands-on training in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design.

technicalSkills.label: Programming
technicalSkills.value: Swift (iOS), Python, C++, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

projects.name: Personal Webpage
bullets: Designed and developed a personal website to showcase projects, skills, and resume.
Implemented responsive layouts and interactive UI elements for desktop and mobile devices.
Improved accessibility and site usability through clean structure and styling.

projects.name: MealFinder iOS App
bullets: Built an iOS app using SwiftUI and the Spoonacular API to search meals by ingredient and display recipe details.
Implemented JSON parsing and MVVM architecture to manage data flow and UI updates cleanly.
Added a favorites feature and responsive SwiftUI List-based UI for improved usability.

projects.name: ProjectClean Web Application
projects.tech: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
bullets: Developed a platform for reporting campus issues in real-time, including cleaning, maintenance, and safety.
Implemented user login, media uploads, issue tracking dashboard, and secure authentication.
Helped centralize and simplify how campus issues are reported and tracked.
Managed daily patient intake, scheduling, and front-desk operations in a busy medical office.
Communicated with patients by phone and in person to address inquiries and coordinate appointments.
Assisted physicians with electronic prescriptions and patient record updates using iClinic.
Collected vital signs and assisted during examinations to support clinical assessments.
Operated medical equipment while following safety and procedural guidelines.
Supervised up to 25 campers daily, ensuring their safety, emotional well-being, and active engagement.
Led activities such as soccer, arts and crafts, and swimming to promote teamwork and creativity.
Maintained a structured daily schedule, improving time management and overall program efficiency.
Led a team of 20+ executive board members to plan, coordinate, and execute campus-wide events.
Organized cultural and social events attended by 50+ students, increasing student engagement and participation.
Designed promotional materials using Canva and managed outreach to effectively market events.
